movies.title: THE QUIET GIRL
movies.criticsConsensus: A remarkable debut for writer-director Colm Bair√©ad, The Quiet Girl offers a deceptively simple reminder that the smallest stories can leave a large emotional impact.

movies.title: HAPPENING
movies.criticsConsensus: A tough but rewarding watch, Happening puts a personal face on an impossibly difficult choice and its heart-rending aftermath.
